cbml:panel.head: Samson and David
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Out of the mists of history comes the might Samson--like his famous ancestor, Samson pits his tremendous strength against he forces of evil and injustice--Muâ¦ high priest of evil, plots agains civilizationâ¦

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What a funny looking truck outside hereâ¦ Never saw one like it before!
That's strange! What's it look like?
You're right--I never saw one like this before!
Wonder what it's doing here?
What the--!
Gas---Help!
No time to look for doors now!
That gas is sinking--I'd better get David up on the roof here!
Oh!
Adn then I'll look for those rats!
You all right David?
I will be in a minuteâ¦ That's some gas!
I'll wait for you!
Stay here and get your breath David--I'll be back!
First I might as well tend to this item!
I'll just toss it where it can't do any harm!
âAnd you boys can tell me who is responsible for that trick!
You're rotten shots---You haven't a chance!
See how you like this treatment!
But look out for the bumps!
I'll just let that fellow get away and see where he goes!
So there's where they hang out!
First I'll see how David is getting along--
Come onâ¦ Jumpâ¦ I'll catch you!
I hope so!
See? I said I'd catch you!
Ugh! So you did!
Come on--We've got a little job to do down by the waterfront!
It looks at though we're not welcome!
Try and sneak under it!
They certainly closed the door fast!
That's no obstacle for me--
Let's go in!
The place looks deserted now!
The rats have run back into their holes!
Look out! You are getting careless
Oops! What's this?
Glad I didn't go first!
Quite a little trick--It would have torn most people in half!
Wellâ¦ What's this?
Looks like some sort of secret factor!
What? Lookâ¦ this place is right over the river!
These machines are made to stamp out the coins of every nation in the world!
That's handy--just stand aside there!
Oh...Oh!
No one has any business using this sort of thing!
Well, they won't again!
You go ahead and play-- I'll look around!
Go ahead...Holler if you want me!
Oh-Oh...Do I hear something?
Help! Help!!
Samson--Help!!
Sounds like David...Wonder what he's got into?
It comes from up there...I'd better look into it!
This is the quickest way to get upstairs!
I might have known you'd get into something!
Hurry--It's coming down!
Is that so?
You do pick the darnest places to take a nap!
I am myself!
Now I'm beginning to get tired of these games.
There's going to be a change in this waterfront beginning now!
What do you mean?
Yes...Where are you going to put it?
Did you say this was right over the river?
There she goes!
Whee!
A man is trying to swim away-- The current is too strong for him!
Might be a good ideato fish him out!
Quick...To the bridge--Get your lariat ready!
I'm right you!
Help!
Don't let him get by you, David!
I've almost got him now!
Hold tight!
I've got him!
Save me! Don't-Don't let go!
Don't let go of our friend there!
I'm hanging on all right!
We're here!
You saved my life--I must warn you now!
Just tell us who's making all this trouble!
Of what?
High priest of evil? Sounds daffy!
It is Arpor, high priest of evil-- who is behind this...He has sworn to get you!
Yes...He and his devotees are mad... But very dangerous---
I believe you!
Duck, everybody--We're bombed!
Look out, Samson!
I think I can fix that!
And that's the end of you!
What a shot!
Thank you! Renounce Arpor and his crazy worship... I'll protect you!
I'll do as you say!
Oooh!
Now I'm going into the mountains after Arpor!
Oh...I want to go!
I know I shouldn't take you, but you'd come along somehow, anyway!
That's right
Whew--Is this supposed to be a path?
Arpor's just making it hard for his visitors!
So it is...Don't let it bother you!
Oh-Oh! Artillery!
Better change your elevation, Boys!
Nice jumping, there!
I'll borrow this for a minute!
Oooo!
Oh, Boy!
You can try and put these together after!
Run!
Look at 'em run!
What a demon!
Let 'em go! They will warn the boss!
This is easier going, anyway!
They've cut the bridge, now what?
Looks like we'll have to jump it!
All right, Let's jump!
Jump? You mean you'll fall!
Hey!
Try and grab me, David!
--What happened?
You lit on me--good luck neither of us is hurt!
Hide and follow us...I'm going to pretend I'm stunned--
I get it!
The sacrifice Kali...The sacrifice!
Oh...Where am I?
Why it must be my Pal Arpor, the high priest!
Ha! Fiends--Seize him!
Who's seizing who?
A-agh! Help
Kill him!
I'll see you again--Rat!
Oof!
Ugh!
Hail, Kali, Goddess of evil--You and I have a date!
--What is he doing?
You're a heavy girl, too, Kali--
Smite him, Kali!
Sacrilege!
But let's take walk together!
Kill, Kali...Kill!
Come on, Kali--Do your stuff!
Why does she not smite him?
What...no smiting?
See? He is stronger than evil! She cannot harm him!
Die...Infidel!
Now what's this guy up to?
I shall avenge Kali...
Lightning gun, huh?
Ohhh!
Ha-Ha! That got him!
I can't move!
One more will finish him off!
You won't be firing that again, you rat!
Just to make sure of hitting him----
Must---Get up---
How do you like that?
GLUG!
I must destroy that gun!
This thing's to dangerous to leave around!
This seems to be the local dumping grounds!
Ha!Ha!
Fiends!
I think we'd better follow this cable and find his source of supply!
Yes! Must be a generator around somewhere!
There it is--A whole power plant!
Capable of generating plenty power too, I'll bet!
They shouldn't have bothered to lock this up!
It isn't them much good!
I hate to smash such a neat set-up!
I don't!
I guess this is the best way to eliminate this!
Boy...Some splash!
Just to settle the whole problem at once!
Look out for the flood!
Now, let's go back and pick up Arpor--
Make it snappy--Or you'll get wet!
Gone Again?
And I thought I had him tied up good and tight!
Aha!
There he is!
Keep back...You won't live to touch me again!
Not this season!
Arrr! I'll get you yet!
Oof!
Good! Out of the way there!
Look out, now...This stuff is hot!
All right I'm out of the way!
Well, get an egg and fry it...
What a waste of good cooking material!
What a waste of good cooking material!
Well, get an egg and fry it---
And this is the end of this cult!
Good thing, too!
I've had enough!
Think we can find a nice safe cage for this bird?
Yes...We can hang him up on so many charges he'll never get out again!
cbml:panel.note: Follow the exploits of the mighty Samson--in the next issue!

cbml:panel.head: Flip Falcon in the Fourth Dimension
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Flip Falconâ¦inventor of the fourth dimension machineâ¦projects himself into the unknown and mysterious elements never before explored by manâ¦
Flip recieves a visitor...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What can I do for you madam?
You can render me a great service...
I was once a very beautiful woman until a rejected suitor threw acid in my face!
Now...Look at me!
There is only one way to regain my lost beauty---In the forth dimension, there is a purifying element which restores the married! Will you take me to it?
Certainly...wait till I change to me dimension clothes!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Flip leads the woman to his dimension machine...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: There! The power is on! When I step into radio circle...Follow me--You're not afraid, are you?
No!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Flip and Nora step into the powerful beams of the machine!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here we go!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...And are sent coursing through the unfathomable regions of the fourth dimension---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh...This is wonderful!
Quite a show, eh?
My face...Look at it--Is it all right yet?
Huh?
Boy--And how!
Come on...We can go back now!
I'm so grateful to you!
Wait!
Lucifer!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Swiftly Lucifer scoops Nora up in the palm of his hand!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: A choice morsel--Thank you, falcon!
Put her down!
Who's going to make me?
Help!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Lucifier speeds through the elements with flip close upon his heels!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'll get you!
Ho! Ho!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Into the mysterious labyrinths of the home of the devil!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ah...My pretty one! Home at last...
I'll put you in the flame of Satan! It'll make you my size and give you my mind--Then I'll cal you---Satana!
You beast!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: In the meantime...Flip reaches the gates of Lucifier's cave--
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...So this is where the old rascal lives! But what can I do now?
Great day!
Emoceb a lived namow!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Lucifier thrusts Nora into the raging flames!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Help!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Pressing the contr-button on his belt, Flip shoots into the cave!..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hang on to me!
Flip!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...And seizes Nora!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here we go!
Whew! You got here just in time!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Lucifier rushes to the door, and rushes a huge rock up against it!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ho-Ho! This is the only exit! Now I have both of you in my power!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Flip and Nora seek refuge in the rocks of the cave...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Come on...There must be some other way out of this!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The caverns are too small for Lucifer to enter, so he waits---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You've got to come out sometime!
Flip! Look!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Meeting them hand-on is Zezo, the monster guardian of the pass!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Owrah!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Behind them---Lucifer---Ahead, Zezo---The thing charges!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Duck, Nora!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But it is brought to a dead stop by the electrical discharges in Flips body!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Rowr!
Can't take it, eh?
This ought to keep you quite!
Ooooff!!!
Ooh! What a horrible creature that was!
I hope we don't run into any more!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Soon they come to the worst of all hazards--The pool of death!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Flip! Look at that black water!
That's not water-It's poison!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Rising out of the depths of the thick poison---Robbo---The Dragon!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Well! Well! Look what's here!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But Flips electric rays make the dragon docile!
Under Flip's control, the dragon carries Flip and Nora over the dangerous pool...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Some service, eh, Nora?
You bet!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...And deposits them at the mouth of the cavern!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Look...Nora--We're free!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Pressing his control button, flip leads Nora through the fourth dimension!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whew! That was close!
And how!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Lucifer, in the meantime...grows impatient--
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Where are they? They should have turned back by this time!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Suddenly Flip's voice is projected to him by electrical rays...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Goodbye Lucy, old boy... We got away!
Huh?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Running outside, he is just in time to see them vanish in the elements!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You escaped me again! But I'll get you yet!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Onward, they plunge back to the Earth!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Boy...Home again!
It never looked so beautiful!
Well...That's another job done!
Yes...And we almost paid for it with our lives!
Thanks to you, I'm no longer marked!
Thanks!
Thank you!

div.note: Follow Flip Falcon on his daring fourth dimension adventures in the next issue....

cbml:panel.head: Yank WilsonSuper-spy Q-4
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Yank Wilson...known as Q-4, foils the insidious plots of foreign agents, who would endanger the United States--A mysterious country clamps a submarine blockade around the United States... Yank Wilson ferrets it out!
The new American super-liner yankee...leaves Honolulu on the return trip of her maiden voyage!
Ten hours out of Honolulu...She is mysteriously torpedoed!
The next day another ship leaving New York harbor is torpedoed!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Some unknown country has clamped a submarine blockade on us! Yank--It's your job to find out the name of this country!
Yes, sir!
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: At Washington

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Extra! United States ships torpedoed! Extra!
What a mess--I've a job on which the security of my country depends-- Yet I don't know where to begin! Boy--Give me a paper!
I'll see this boyce--who saw the submarine! He may be able to give me a clue!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Yank speeds to Mr. Boyce's home...

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Mr. Boyce is a very ill man--What's that?
Halt--Or I'll fire!
That's what you think!
I said--Drop it!
Blast 'em!
Too bad I'm a few minutes late--You did you dirty work well!
A score for the fatherland!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The police arrive...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Mr. Boyce saw the submarine that sank the S. S. Exeter city! He knew too much, so they killed him!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The murderer is given the third degree!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Why did you kill Boyce? Who sent you?
My mother! Aw-w go take a jump in the lake!
In that case you'll get the hot-seat...How do you like that, my fine friend?
No...No! I--I'll...I'll talk!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As the murderer is about to talk, the lights go out, and--
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ya-eee!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The lights are snapped on, but there is no trace of the murderer!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Well, I'll be--! How could he have been killed in this well guarded room?
It's an inside job...There's a spy among the detectives!
I'll check the finger prints on this knife!
Gypsum will bring out all latent fingerprints...Then I'll photograph them!
I'll check these fingerprints with the photos in my rogue's gallery!
I'm right...It's Captain Marano of the savmont secret service!
He looks like one of the detectives in the third degree room!
Quite right my clever Mr. Wilson!
Captain Marano!
My compliments for your brilliant work, but you're a dangerous man!
That's what you think!
It won't be very healthy to try anything funny, Captain Wilson!
You can't get away with this!
May I trouble you to come with me to the rendenvous of my worthy compatriots?
I'll bet they're unworthy!
I'll overlook the insult--since we'll liquidate you in our scientific manner! Get going!
In the meantime: Hope you'll enjoy our hospitality!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: At the spies' rendezvous...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Gentlemen--This is Yank Wilson!
Now's the time for me to act!
Stop...Or I'll give the business to Marano!
Shoot him down!
No...No!
They'd murder their own pals to get me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Using Marano as a shield Yank fires away at his assailants!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here's an example of American straight shooting!
You guys started this, and I'm going to finish it!
I can't hold out much longer alone...I need help!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Yank knocks the telephone receiver off its hook!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Gunfire...I'd better call the police!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The operator sends help to Yank---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You sure you came just in time!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Armed with information found in von hurts room...Destroyers speed toward a submarine base in the Atlantic
The airplanes and destroyers drop depth charges...
...And the savmontian submarines are destroyed!
At the White House...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The United States owes you a great debt of gratitude, Yank Wilson!
We must be prepared at all times!
cbml:panel.note: Yank smashes another spy-ring in the next issue!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Space Smith, interplanetary explorer, patrols the far reaches of space with his partner Diana, to keep the shipping lanes clear of pirates....private ships, zooming through space, have been attacked by a mystery rocket whose crew plunder them and then blast them to bits by super-power bombs---
A terrific blast, shatters a space rocket to bits! The space pirates have claimed another victim!!
On Earth, Space Smith has been summoned to the office of John Davis, head of the interplanetary insurance.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: And three ships, which my company had insured, were destroyed! I want you to wipe out those murdering pirates! I'll pay you anything!
I'll be glad to help you Mr. Davis!
Have you any idea who's behind all those wrecked space ships?
No, but you can bet your boots I'll find out!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: When Space and Diana reach home, they find a visitor---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Why, It's Bill Harding!!
Haven't seen you in a dog's age, Bill, how are you?
Okay! Just came to say goodbye
My company is sending me to Mars with some valuable securities I'll be gone several months!
It's dangerous to carry valuables through space right now. Why not wait till those pirates are caught?
I'm afraid I can't. This business is important. I'm leaving immediately!
If you must, you must. But watch yourself!
You know, Diana, I think we ought to follow him for safety's sake!
I was just thinking the same thing!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Thus two rockets zoom thru the ether, unaware of the grim fate in store for one of them!!
Bill Harding suddenly sees---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What's th'!! That ship's heading for me! It's going to ram into me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The mystery ship, reinforced with Tungsten steel, tears a hole in Bill Harding's rocket!
Pirates swarm into Harding's ship---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The guy's dead. The shock of the collision killed him!
Find them securities the boss talked about, and don't talk so much!
Here are the securities!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Yank knocks the telephone receiver off its hook!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Gunfire...I'd better call the police!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The operator sends help to Yank---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You sure you came just in time!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Armed with information found in von hurts room...Destroyers speed toward a submarine base in the Atlantic
The airplanes and destroyers drop depth charges...
...And the savmontian submarines are destroyed!
At the White House...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The United States owes you a great debt of gratitude, Yank Wilson!
We must be prepared at all times!
cbml:panel.note: Yank smashes another spy-ring in the next issue!

body.fw: Fantastic comics is on sale the 10th of every month

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: There sher goes!! Okay, spunk, head for the hideout!
Oh, space! They got Bill!
Those dirty rats are going to pay for this!
Hey, Squint, we're being followed!
Yeah! And from the looks of those steel plates we won't be able to ram her! We'll fix 'em at our hideout!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: On an unexplored planet, the pirate lands on a secret rocket port!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Man that rocket gun! We'll bring down that ship which is following us!
Okay, squint!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The powerful ray rips off the entire front end of space's ship!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Now we'll see who our friends are!
Well! If it ain't Space Smith!
Yes, It's Space Smith! And you'll be sorry you ever met me!
But not so sorry as you're gonna be. You two are gonna take a little swim in the volcano! Take 'em up to the crater, spunk!
What are we going to do Space?
We haven't reached the top of the volcanoe yet. Keep your courage!
Don't think her gonnna pull any tricks! The first phoney move, and zing, I'll blast her head off!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The instant they reach the top of the volcano ---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Drop, Diana!
What th'!
Drop that gun!
When you hit the hot lava, tell me how you like it!
Now we'll find the others and fix their wagons!
I wonder where they are?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: A small clearing sorrounded by walls of rock, is the improvised office of squuint and his mob...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here are the securities. You'd better take them to Earth and hand them to the boss!
Okay, Squint!
So, this is their rathole, eh? Well, I'm going to clean it out!
Greetings my friends!
You fellows and I are going to have a little fun!
When I get through with you, you won't know what hit you!
Out of my way, you spoil the scenery!
You haven't had enough yet, eh?
You asked for it, Space Smith!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: At that instant a gigantic tremor sends tons of rock hurtling into the clearing!!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What in---
Great scott! An earthquake! Diana, where are you!
Diana! Thank heaven you're safe! Quick! Get into one of those space ships! We've got to get off this planet!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The instant space and Diana zoom away from the doomed planet!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: There goes the planet! I guess its crust wasn't strong wasn't strong enough to hold back the white hot lava!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: In the office of John Davis the next morning...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here y'are, boss. There's them securities you told us to get. By the way, squint nabbed Space Smith and put him out of the way!!
Good! Little did that fool know that I was the boss of those pirates I sent him to wipe out!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: At that instant the door flies open---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: No, Mr. Davis, I didn't realize that you were the leader. But I know it now!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: A ray gun suddenly appears----
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You'll never tell anyone, Space! I'll blast your head wide open!
That's what you think, mister!
This is to pay off for what you did to my friend, Bill Harding!
He'll have enough time to regret Bill's death before he hits the street!
cbml:panel.note: Follow the adventures of Space Smith in the next issue

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Richard, the Golden Knight of warwick pusues his unrelenting crusade against the oppressors of his day he punishes the wicked, but gives succor th the needy
Synopsis: Having resued his brother Roland, and his trusted retainer bart, from the clutches of the usurping black baron, Richard is once again master of warwick.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We'll start from here, where your father discovered the gold mine!
Let us enter then!
Wait! Your father cursed this passage because your mother was lost in its labyrinths!
I don't fear any curse! I am going to investigate this place anyway!
I'm going along!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Unwilling to admit his fears and superstitions, Bart plunges into the unknown depths of the cave!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Richard! Alice! I'm coming with you!
Hurry, Bart or we'll lose you!
I'll blaze a trail for our return trip!
We'll take the larger tunnel!
This stalagmite is exceptionally hard to nick...What's this?
Sorry I've spoiled your beauty nap, beetle-brain!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The monster rears up from the terrific blows of Richard's sword!
As Richard slays the hosaurus, Alice utters a piercing shriek of terror!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Help! Richard! The monster's tail is crushing me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: With a mighty blow, Richard severs the monster's tail, relieving Alice!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hurt my Alice will you?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Richard flings the heavy tail aside!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: There! Wriggle somewhere else!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Suddenly Bart cries a warning....
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Look above you, Richard!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Richard whirls in time to swing at the huge flying reptile!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The bigger, The better.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Still more reptiles swoop and attack!
Richard leaps high into the air, plunging his sword through the reptile's head!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Take that!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Suddenly another winged reptile wraps its powerful tail around Richard's knees!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: This is a fine mess!
So this is the way my end is come! Well, do your worst!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: With reckless courage, Bart flings himself upon the reptile!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Now, Richard, finish him!
Good work, Bart!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: During the excitement, covetous eyes dwell upon the prostrate Alice!
A gruesome treeman silently abducts her
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Um! Maybe Kula get reward for Earth-girl!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Richard and Bart return unscathed from their battle, to find Alice gone!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Alice! Alice!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: They examine the ground closely...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hm-m! Those strange tracks...Alice has been carried off by their owner!
If so much as a hair on Alice's head is harmed, I'll kill the one responsible!
Steady, lad, your time will come!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As Richard and Bart round a bend.....
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Bart, a beast-like man just passed, carrying Alice!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Richard overtakes the tree-man, unseen...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Just in time!
That's right! Drop her...gently!!
This is the end for you!
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But another tree-man has witnessed the astonishing scene!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I go warn queen!
O' great queen, Kula the strong was killed by an Earth-man!
What? It is impossible! Kula was the most powerful of all my men!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Queen Martha orders out the guard to capture this Earth-man alive!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I am going along!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Meanwhile, Richard urges Alice and Bart to quicken their pace.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: O, Richard, we're lost!
Don't fear, we'll get out of this!
We've come to a dead end!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: They retrace their steps, but only to find a blind alley!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Something's amiss! Here's the nick I marked, yet the passage is blocked!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As they bear to their right......
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: So that's their game...Closing in on us!
Alice, Bart! It's a trap...Prepare to fight!
Hurry Bart!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The intrepid three fight back to back!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Fight your way toward elevation!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Just as they reach the elevation, a huge club descends on Bart's head!
With Bart stunned and out of the fray, Alice and Richard fight heroically against great odds!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Are there any more of you?
Good work, Alice!
I, Martha, queen of the tree-folk challenge you, girl!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The robust queen charges like a bull!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'll cut you to bits!
We'll see!
I've never fought a woman such as this one!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Richard and Alice have the upper hand until a tree-man....
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I fix this demon with terrible sword! Ha!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: With a long pole knocks down a large stalactite above Richard's head!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Look out, over you Roch...!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Alice's warning comes too late! The stalactite crashes on Richard's head!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, Richard! Speak to me, darling!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Upon hearing Richard's name, a sudden change comes over the Queen!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Cease all fighting!
You've killed him!
Richard? I had an older son by that name and under his left ear he had a crescent shaped mole!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Trembling, Queen Martha removes Richard's helmet gently she lifts his ear!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Heaven be praised! It is my son, my Richard!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Slowly, Richard regains consciousness
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Where am I? Where's Alice? Who are you?
You are with Alice and your mother!
Richard, my dear!
B-But I don't understand! Bart told me my mother was lost twenty years ago, in these tunnels! I was scarcely six years old then!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: A short time later Bart stumbles on the strange group! He gapes!!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Do I dream? Y-You, you're Martha Warwick! I swear it!
Hello, Bart!
Mother!
cbml:panel.note: More thrilling adventures of the Golden Knight

cbml:panel.head: Captain KiddExplorer
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Captain Kidd, explorer and adventurer, fights danger and death in the remotest corners of the Earth.....In darkest Africa he fights against tremendous odds to foil the plots of a desperate gang og killers..At a cafe in Loango Captain Kidd overhears an interesting conversation...

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I know that Smith found that princess diamond. We've got to get a plane anf ly to LA!
What's this?
Can they be talking of Buz Smith? Buz once told me about a big diamond he found! I'd better look into this!
Couldn't help overhearing your talk about the princess diamond, fellows!
You got big ears, huh?
Mebbe. But you need a plane and I got one! How about hiring me?
You got a plane, huh? We'll pay you two grand to fly us to LA! But don't fergit that me, Bill Sedden, is the boss! I give all the orders!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Five hours later
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Awright, Kidd. There's LA!--Smith's cabin is about five miles outta town--Set this crate down
O.K., Sedden!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Captain Kidd lands his plane almost at the front door of Buz Smith...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: That looks like Captain Kidd's plane! Wonder what he wants here?
Hey, there! How are ya, Kidd?
Here's Buz. The only way I can help him is by pretending to be one of the crooks!
Ya'd better wait where ya are, smith!
What's the big idea? Why those guns?
We came to get the princess diamond! You better hand it over!
Why, you dirty rat! You're nothing but a rotten crook!
Stay where ya'are, buddy, or name's mud!
You'll pay for that Mr. Sudden!
Let the bum lay there! We're going in the hut and look for the sparkler!
Well, here's the rock! Worth more 'n a million! We'll be gettin' pretty!
Don't you think we'd better beat it, Sedden?
You'll fly us out to the hideout the guy that'll buy the diamond'll be there. I'll show you the way!
Okay, Sedden!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: A small clearing cut off from the rest of the world by granite cliffs.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Quite a place you've got here, Sedden!
Yeah, Captain Kidd, nobody knows about this dump but and my gang!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Captain Kidd follows Sedden to a tent in the center of the clearing...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We'll put the rock in here. You'll have to hang around till Gimpson gets here! Can't pay ya off till he buys the stone!
Plenty of time, Sedden, anyways. I'd like to take a look around!
I noticed the combination of the safe. Tonight I'll sneak over and get that diamond!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Late that night..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: So far everything worked pretty. Well! now, if I can get to the plane!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But at that moment...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hello, Kidd!! Explorin' eh? Kinda thought I wouldn't be able to trust ya! Well, ya ain't gonna get far with that rock!
I don't think you'll stop me, Sedden!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Whipping the gun out og Sedden's hand, Captain Kidd...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here's a dose of your own medicine, Sedden, how do you like it?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As Captain Kidd rushes out of the tent...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, oh! What have we here?
I see that I've got to tame you guys down a bit.
Quite a feat when it's done with the feet, eh?
Those bullets are whistling kind of close!
Great scott! The guy with the tommy-gun hit my fuel line!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Unable to control the plane, Capt. Kidd crashes into the jungle...
The instant Captain Kidd leaps out of his doomed plane..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Wow! Just got out of that inferno in time!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Suddenly, from out of the thicket..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What th..!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Captain Kidd tears a spear from the hands of the foremost savage
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'm kind of handy with these things myself!
Out of my way, buddy, you spoil the scenery!
Looks as though I made a touchdown!
So long, boys. I'd like to play with you a little longer, but I'm in a hurry.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: After two days of struggling through the thorny underbrush, Captain Kidd reaches Buz Smith's cabin...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I never thought that cabin could look so good to me! I was afraid I wouldn't make it!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: When Captain Kidd enters Buz Smith's cabin..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You! You thieving skunk! What do you want here?
Hold on with that gun, Buz, and listen!
Here's your stone the only way I could prevent those crooks from stealing it was by pretending to be one of them!
And those guys won't bother you again! I killed their leader as soon as I get a plane, I'll wipe out the rest of them!
I'm not going to thank you, Kidd. I'll do something better..I'll buy you a new plane and help you get those crooks!
cbml:panel.note: Another exciting adventure of Captain Kidd in the next issue-

cbml:panel.head: StardustThe Super Wizard
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Stardust, whose vast knowledge of interplanetary science has made him the most remarkable man that ever lived, devotes his abilities to racket-busting
Stardust is enraged over the spread of war on the Earth........
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The earthpeople are victims of a military craze!
These invasions would be impossible without the aid of the fifth columns. I must stamp out all fifth columns!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Stardust heads for the Earth in his tubular spacial.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'll work with my young sixth column in America!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: All over the United States, in city and town, sixth column clubs have been formed to combat the underhand work of the fifth column...
The members are all loyal American boys, eager to help their country..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Stardust is coming!
He's going to tell us what to do!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Soon, in every sixth column clubroom, a flash appears
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Stardust is here now!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: From out of each flash, a mighty voice speaks.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'm going to give all of you scientific equipment that will enable you to get fifth column information

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Each boy suddenly becomes dressed in a star-metal suit and a thought-recording collar.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Look!
Oh, boy! A sixth column outfit!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Stardust's voice reaches every sixth column member.......
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'll tune your thought-recorders for the fifth column. Get all the information possible!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The sixth column immediately sets out to find fifth column members..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Gee, I can hear somebody thinking!
So can I!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: In a locked room in New York, two men are whispering. One is the head of the fifth column. The other is a big American Recketeer.......
The sixth column thought-recorders convey the men's thoughts and whispers.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Did you hear that? The fifth column and the American racketeers are working together to help conquer America and take over American business!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The sixth column boys get more information through their thought-recorders.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The racketeers have a secret supply of arms and ammunition hidden in that building!
And stolen warplanes too!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The boys also find out that ships from Europe, by aid of the fifth column, are smuggling special magnets into the country.
The American racketeers take charge of the magnets as they arrive...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: These electrically operated magnets will be concealed in the heart of every large city and in big industrial plants!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: At the same time, along the coast of Europe, gigantic guns are being set up and pointed towards America..

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Holy Mackerel! World-invaders from the Eastern hemisphere are preparing to shoot enormous shells across the ocean to America, and those powerful magnets will be used to draw the shells vital points!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: On the European coast, planes also are ready to take off and follow up the bombardment....There are thousands of transatlantic bombers and troop-carriers, all tuned up..
The sixth column leaders rush to their super radiophonic sets....
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We'll report to Stardust.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Stardust, hovering in the stratosphere, is keeping in touch with his sixth column by means of a universal sound plate and anoramic television unit.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The boys are doing a swell job! I'll talk to the leaders!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The young leaders are suddenly whisked into the air towards Stardust
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whew!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: They come into his presence.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We've found out plenty, Stardust! The world-invaders are coming.....
We'll take care of them! I'll give you more powers! I'll equip you with metal-repelling rays, to repel the shells!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The young leaders, suddenly equiped with ray belts, are transmitted back to their stations.
Meanwhile, the racketeers have installed the magnets in big industrial plants and in densely populated parts of large cities.
In Europe, the big guns are aimed at the objectives with the greatest precision.
The fifth column places its suicide squads where they can successfully operate the magnets.
And members lurk ready to take over all fueling bases for the invading warplanes.
The great guns boom, shaking the land.
And the huge, winged shells zoom out into the sky.
At the same time, the fleet of giant warplanes takes off for America..
The sixth column boys, ready with their metal-repelling rays, await the arrival of the sheels....
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: They'll soon be in range of our rays!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The gloating leaders of the fifth column and the big-shot racketeers gather in an observation baloon to watch the bombardment.....
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Everything is ready!
When the warplanes arrive and re-fuel, they'll sweep across the continent! Then America's wealth and big business will be in our hands!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The shells finally appear, and the boys release their rays.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The magnets are drawing them! Give 'em full load!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The shells begin to lose motion and drift aimlessly in the sky.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We've stopped them, in spite of the magnets!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: One of the shells drifts out of range of the rays and falls upon an ocean liner.
The destruction is complete...
The next instant, Stardust swoops out of the heavens........
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We must take no more risk!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Under his control, the shells begin to take motion again, and he turns them back towards Europe
The oncoming warplanes of the invaders are now nearing the coast.
Stardust carefully directs the shells straight for the planes..
The shells and planes meet...
And the wreckage crashes into the sea.
The fifth column members and the racketeers rave........
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What has happened?
Who is meddling with our plans?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The sixth column boys waste no time.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We must round up all the fifth column members and the racketeers before they escape!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: While the boys are locating the scattered horde with their thought-recorders, Stardust descends upon the observation baloon containing the leaders.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'll fix this bunch!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: After he parts the cable with his fusing ray, the baloon and its helpless occupants drift over the skycrapers of New York.....
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: This is the end of us!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Stardust directs the baloon to a gentle landing in Central Park...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Maybe we can escape!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As the occupants attempt to flee, Stardust swoops down upon them.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Your time has come!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Before they can use their weapons, the conspirators feel his fury...
His powerful fists move like lightning.
Then he picks up their limp forms and hurls them out into the ocean.....
Meanwhile, the sixth column boys have located the remaining conspirators.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: They're everywhere!
We must contact Stardust immediately!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As Stardust receives the various messages, he releases his powerful anti-gravity rays and focuses them on the plotters........
The thousands of the public enemies rise rapidly to a focal point above the clouds.
Then Stardust crashes into the horde with such tremendous speed that the friction turns them to ashes...
As the sixth column boys watch in amazement, the sky lights up and a familiar voise greets them..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Nice work, boys! You helped to save your country!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: All over America, people are joyful.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Stardust and the boys saved us!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As Stardust drifts towards space, the broadcasting companies send out America's message.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Thanks, Stardust! Many thanks!
cbml:panel.note: Follow the exploits of the remarkable Stardust in the next exciting issue.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sub Sanders...lone wolf crusader of the deep, captains his under-sea fighter for the navy of the future...
The peaceful waters surrounding new America are disturbed by the surge of a rising submarine...

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Position---Good--Send up the message flare!
Look...A flare!
Gosh...What is it?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The council meets to decide on a course of action!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: It's Kong, the under-sea pirate! He will not hesitate to bomb the city!
That's true...sire!
But we cannot allow him to hi-jack us like this! If we weaken now...There is no telling when he willl stop! Therefore, it's war!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The command goes out to the coast defense guns to fire upon the sub!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Fire!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But the sub subwerges and Kong calls his men together!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: So they want war, eh? Very well--Give them the works general1

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Swiftly Kong's war-sub shoots along the floor of the ocean---
---And sweeps up into the sky.
Kong strikes his first blow!
The gun-crew is destroyed
Another shot wipes out the coast guard quarters.
The death-sub returns to its undersea base...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ha! That'll show them!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But sub saunders springs into action!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'd better get to my sub and put a stop to this nonsense!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Boarding his ship Sub swiftly descends to the treacherous currents of the ocean!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: There it is!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sub leaves his ship to venture on foot toward Kong's domain....
But Kong is not idle---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ah, look! An intruder--I'll soon fix him!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Kong releases a poison dragon to stop Sub!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Holy Smoke!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: With a rush the monster springs to the attack!
But Sub hitting a projecting growth, hurls straight into beast's eye!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: It's a hit!
Here...have another--just to keep you quite!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Leaving the monster a helpless hulk-Sub rushes toward Kong's fortress!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Open up, Kong! You've got a visitor!
Sire, Saunders is at the door!
Let him in--But stand by!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As sub enters the room--Sharp eyes watch from secret panels...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: When Kong gives me the signal...Sub will be wiped out for good
Kong--I demand you give up this mad idea to war upon the city!
My dear Saunders-you are in no position to demand!
For all I have to do is to signal and electro-rays will blast you into minute particles of nothing! Ha-ha! Then nothing can stop me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Suddenly Sub leaps toward Kong!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Maybe so, you rat--But you'll go with me!
How do you like them for apples?
Kill him! Kill him!
Get him!
Ho-ho! More playmates, eh?
Look out! Here I come!
Oof!
Ugh!
Two in one!
Oh!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: With two aides knocked out, Sub picks up Kong!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Come on, boy...I'm taking you back to the city to stand trial!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sub takes off with his prisoner!
But directly in his path--stealing silently through the under-sea growth---Kong's death-ship!
With Kong bound, Sub sees the death ship!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Mmmm...it seems your friends want to play tag with me!
If they open fire on you, I'll be killed, too! Let me go free, Saunders, and I'll make you me partner!
Not on your life, Kong! I'm going to show your men what it means to buck up against me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Seb veers sharply in his course...Bringing his ship directly over his opponent...

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Good! A direct hit!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But Kong's men are not idle!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Fire!!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: As the shot rocks the Sub, Kong shrieks in agony!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Untie me! I'm not going to die like a dog!
Take it easy!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: With superhuman force born of desperation, Kong breaks his bonds!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ha-ha! Now I'll have my revenge!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Picking up a wrench, Kong prepares to strike the unwary Sub a treacherous blow!
Just then Sub's boat is rocked by another shot from the death-ship!
--And Kong is knocked to the wall!
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh-ho! Up to your old tricks, eh?
I guess I'll really have to keep you quite!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sub fires on the death-ship, and hits the powder room!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: And that will keep them quite! Well--Kong, you're going for a ride!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sub delivers the criminal to the custody of the president---
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here he is, sir--! The madman Kong!
Saunders! You've done it again!

cbml:panel.note: Don't forget to follow my coming under-sea adventures in the next issue!
